item.body:

value.data: The N8 is the latest and most advanced handset so far in the N Series. Packed with features including HD video capture, Carl Zeiss optics, HDMI connection for connecting the handset to compatible TVs and projectors. Premium-quality Dolby Digital Plus technology, integrated social networking, all Ovi services and on-demand Web TV. Navigation for over 70 countries is included.

value.data: The Nokia E72 is a high-performance device tailor-made for seamless business and personal communication. Instant email access for up to 10 personal email accounts, real-time chat through Windows Live Messenger™ and other IM services. Large display screen and qwerty keyboard for fast communication. The E72 has a 5 megapixel camera and video capture, as well as 3G internet access and built in Wi-Fi.

value.data: The C3 is a classic monoblock phone, with large touch screen and a large keypad, all set in a durable stainless steel casing. Ideal for those who spend a lot of time chatting and keeping in touch with their friends, the C3 pulls feeds from Facebook and Twitter directly to your homescreen and gives you easy access to your email and chat with dedicated widgets. the 3.5G connection and Wi-Fi gives you fast access to the internet and the 5 megapixel camera ensures you're always ready to capture those shareable moments.

Enjoy fast web access and a touch screen with full VGA detail.

value.data: With its fun and colourful Interchangeable covers, the Nokia 500 enables you to make your own statement. Discover new apps music and games from Nokia Store and send and receive social status updates direct from your home screen with social networking. Make your home screens your own with widgets, themes and pictures and share your moments with the 5MP camera.

value.data: The C6 comes packed with features keeping you in touch with all that matters to you. The handset offers a large touch-screen with slide-out qwerty keyboard underneath. Get easy access to all your personal email accounts, browse the web with the Wi-Fi 3G service, or navigate using the pre-installed Ovi Maps. 5 megapixel camera, video capture, and 16 GB expandable memory. Comes with music player and pre-installed games as well as Ovi Store for further apps downloading.

value.data: The C6-01 is a brand new Nokia phone in the C Series. Optimised for social networking, the handset runs on Symbian^3, has a large touch-screen and 2 soft keys. GPS is built in, as is Wi-Fi, an 8 megapixel camera and a sliding Qwerty keyboard for easy communication. Ovi services like Ovi Mail and Communication is pre-installed. And Ovi Store allows for easy apps-download.

• Easy-to-use email client with attachment support for images, videos, music and documents .doc, .xls, .ppt, .pdf, .zip
• HTML support for email
• Unified email client for multiple protocols: Yahoo!® Mail, Gmail™, Windows Live™, Hotmail and other popular POP/IMAP services, Mail for Exchange, IBM Lotus traveler
• Email widget for home screen
• Conversational view for SMS
• Push email and expanded portal support available through Nokia Messaging for Email and Instant Messaging
item.smallprint: * Some services may be available only via downloading or dependent on the market. Only devices that offer compatible multimedia message or e-mail features can receive and display multimedia messages. Content appearance may vary. Some images and ring tones can not be forwarded.

item.title: Call management
item.body:
• Contact shortcuts for your home screens
• Advanced contacts database with support for multiple phone and e-mail details per entry and thumbnail pictures
• Favorites widget
• Logs of dialled, received and missed calls
• Conference calling
• Integrated hands-free speaker
• Video calling

item.title: Browsing and internet
item.body:
• Full web browsing of real web pages
• Web browsing with touch control
• Supported markup languages: HTML, XHTML MP, WML, CSS
• Supported protocols: HTTP v1.1, WAP
• TCP/IP support
• Visual history, HTML and JavaScript suppprt, Flash LIte 4.0 and Flash video support
• Nokia Mobile Search
• RSS reader
• Ovi Store for application downloads
• Support for streaming video
• Social networking profiles visible in phone contacts
• Upload and view photos and see locations via Ovi by Nokia Social client
• Social networking events visible in phone calendar

item.title: GPS and navigation
item.body:
• Integrated GPS, A-GPS
• Ovi Maps with free car & pedestrian navigation
• Wi-Fi Positioning
• Compass and accelerometer for correct orientation of display
• Use Nokia Ovi Suite to get the latest country maps for Ovi Maps for free
item.smallprint: Downloading of maps over-the-air may involve transferring large amounts of data. Your service provider may charge for the data transmission. The availability of particular products, services, and features may vary by region. Please check with your local Nokia dealer for further details and availability of language options. These specifications are subject to change without notice.

item.title: Camera
item.body:
• 8 megapixel camera (3264 x 2448)
• 2x digital zoom
• Dual LED flash
• Second camera (VGA) for video calls
• Still image file formats: JPEG, Exif
• Face recognition feature
• Red eye removal, face tracking and automatic motion blur reduction

item.title: Image capture
item.body:
• Automatic location tagging (geotagging) of images and videos
• Change photos with finger motions
• Images automatically taken in the correct orientation
• Economic sharing to optimise battery and memory use
• Pinch to zoom in Photos image viewer
• View Photos by tags, albums, slideshow
• Photo editor

item.title: Other
item.body:
• 340 MB internal memory, expandable to up to 32 GB with microSD card
• Included 2 GB memory card
• High-Speed USB 2.0 connectivity

item.title: Video sharing and playback
item.body:
• Access to last-played video and easy resume
• Access to Internet Videos, compatible with RSS feeds, and video podcasts, with direct wireless updates and downloads
• Video directory to discover new Internet Videos
• Support for download, streaming, and progressive download
• Support for Flash video
• On demand Webtv widgets to watch internet streaming TV
• Video call support (WCDMA network services)

item.title: Video codecs & formats
item.body:
• H.264, MPEG-4, VC-1, H.263 (CIF 25fps), Real Video 10 (QVGA 25fps), ON2 VP6 (VGA 25fps), Flash video (VGA 25fps)
• Streaming D1 25fps: MPEG-4; H.264; VC-1, RealVideo 10 (QVGA 15fps), 3GP

item.title: Video cameras
item.body:

  • Take high-quality 16:9 videos
  • HD quality 720p resolution
  • Video capture 720p 25 fps with codecs H264, MPEG-4
  • Settings for scene, video light, white balance, colour tone

• Secondary camera (VGA) for video calls

item.title: Music features
item.body:
• Nokia Music Player and mono IHF speaker

• Audio codecs: MP3, AAC, eAAC, eAAC+, WMA, AMR-NB, AMR-WB
• Bit rate up tp 320 kbps
• DRM support WM DRM, OMA DRM 2.0
• Stereo FM radio (87.5-108 MHz/76-90 MHz), RDS

item.body: • Stereo FM radio 87.5-108 MHz with RDS support

Nokia Mini Speaker MD-9, Nokia Bluetooth Stereo Headset BH-504, Nokia Silicone Cover CC-1006 for Nokia 5250

value.data: The stylish 5250 offers one-touch music access from the dedicated Media Bar. Ovi Music allows for simpel downloads of the music you like, and the battery allows you to listen to up to 24 hours of non-stop music after only one charge. Easy access to Facebook and other social networks, and easy share of photos through email, MMS or Ovi Share. Comes with a YouTube dedicated app for easy video watching and is app enabled for downloading on Ovi.com
